metadata.title: CVE-2020-8564 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: In Kubernetes clusters using a logging level of at least 4, processing amalformed docker config file will result in the contents of the dockerconfig file being leaked, which can include pull secrets or other registrycredentials. This affects < v1.19.3, < v1.18.10, < v1.17.13.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
